message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to start with a price of $11000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10500. What do you think?
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $10000. Can you consider $9800?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9800. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $10200? It's a fair price, considering the value the product brings
I understand you want to make a profit, but I'm not willing to go above $9900. Can you meet me at that price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a decent profit. I'm willing to meet you at $10100, but that's as low as I can go. It's a fair price, considering the value the product brings
I'm willing to meet you at $9950, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. If we can't meet at that price, I'll have to consider other options

I understand you're trying to negotiate, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9950. I'm willing to meet you at $10050, which is still a compromise from my initial offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options
I'm willing to meet you at $9990, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you can't meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $12000
